Thanks for posting this, Dan. It is nice to see that you are doing your part of the job and one hopes that some scientists at your end will join hands with the Spaniards and step on the accelerator. Dr. Juan Manuel Miñarro López, Professor of Sculpture at the University of Seville, Spain has published a convincing monograph and the 3D image he created can be seen in the link below:
https://www.academia.edu/11804110/Is_the_Sudarium_of_Oviedo_the_key_to_unraveling_the_mystery_of_the_Shroud_of_Turin
Pope Francis is latino and his native language is Spanish, the right hombre in Rome to get things done. If any petition is sent to him it will have to include both Shroud and Sudarium.
